MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: function GetReport { param($AgentId = "$((glcm).AgentId)", $serviceURL = "http://CONTOSO-REPORT:8080/PSDSCReportServer.svc") $requestUri = "$serviceURL/Nodes(AgentId= '$AgentId')/Reports" $request = Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $requestUri -ContentType "application/json;odata=minimalmetadata;streaming=true;charset=utf-8" ` -UseBasicParsing -Headers @{Accept = "application/json";ProtocolVersion = "2.0"} ` -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue -ErrorVariable ev $object = ConvertFrom-Json $request.content return $object.value }

$reports = GetReport $reports[1]

GetStatusData -Report $report[1]
